english_example_sentence: If the students agree on the difficult project, the work would be easier.
russian_example_sentence: Если студенты договорятся по сложному проекту, работа станет проще.
turkish_example_sentence: Öğrenciler zor projede anlaşsalar, iş daha kolay olur.
turkish_example_sentence_with_blank: Öğrenciler zor projede ______, iş daha kolay olur.
